sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Thomson United States Penitentiary Cession Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Thomson United States Penitentiary Cession Act.

sections.heading: Cession of concurrent jurisdiction
sections.text: The State of Illinois hereby cedes to the United States concurrent jurisdiction in and over the following land comprising the site of the United States Penitentiary, Thomson, described as follows:

sections.heading: Acceptance. Cession shall be effective upon the filing of an acceptance by the United States with the Governor of the State of Illinois in accordance with the requirements of 40 U
sections.text: S.C. 3112. Federal jurisdiction shall end whenever the United States shall cease to own, lease, or use for national purp

sections.heading: Retention of jurisdiction. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to deprive the State of Illinois of any of its jurisdiction over the above described lands
sections.text: Retention of jurisdiction. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to deprive the State of Illinois of any of its jurisdiction over the above described lands.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
